title: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, meaning of dreaming of pregnancy for someone else, by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream “Interpretation of a dream about someone else’s pregnancy There are many interpretations of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, and the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream varies according to the marital status of the dreamer, whether she is a single girl, married, or pregnant. Women. What is the interpretation of the meaning of pregnancy in a dream for the different situations of unmarried, pregnant and married women and the most important interpretations that arose in this vision, as pregnancy is one of the dreams that girls have always seen since their first years of childhood because of the warm and tender feelings that she carries in her heart for her new baby and her infant. Since every girl in her dreams wishes to become a mother who gives tenderness, love, compassion and kindness to her children and husband, what about the interpretation of the Gospel of pregnancy in a dream and is it considered a praiseworthy vision or not? Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin largely agreed on the dream of pregnancy and it can be Identify the most important thing in a dream about pregnancy through the following: Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin agreed that a woman’s pregnancy means a lot of money, an extensive diet, and may indicate children. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin confirmed that a man’s pregnancy is a sign of hardship, fatigue, and anxiety. Ibn Sirin interpreted For an unmarried man to see that she is pregnant is a sign of a good wife, and for a married man to see a pregnancy, this means the imminent pregnancy of his wife. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the pregnancy of a barren woman is a sign of financial problems, poverty, lack of livelihood, and problems and disagreements between the family and relatives. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin agreed that a husband’s dream of his wife’s pregnancy indicates the coming of great goodness, and this vision may indicate the approaching pregnancy of the wife. The meaning of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a pregnancy in a woman’s dream as a sign of distress or sadness that affects her in The current time. The great scholar Ibn Sirin, when he saw pregnancy in a woman’s dream, indicated that God Almighty writes for the abundance of goodness, happiness, and livelihood in her life, and she may enter a new life soon. It is also one of the good visions that brings with it good tidings, happiness, and ease for the pioneer, whether male or female. In fact, as Ibn Sirin actually pointed out. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: A dream about a pregnant woman can indicate a year full of goodness that will be passed on to the dreamer. Whoever sees a pregnant woman in a dream and she is single in reality, his dreams indicate that his marriage Imminent. If the pregnant woman who appeared in the dream is an old woman, then the vision is a warning about the spread of strife, disagreements, poor conditions, and lack of nutrition in society. A man’s dream that his sister is pregnant and not married in reality indicates the imminence of her marriage, especially if she appears in the dream without pain from The dream, but if she is suffering from pregnancy, this means that she is suffering from worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen One of the auspicious dreams for a man is to dream that his mother is pregnant, as the dream indicates that he will obtain the good that comes from his mother. Seeing a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of kidnapping in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the kidnapping of Ibn Sirini: A dream about kidnapping basically indicates failure and anxiety. The person who sees himself in a dream that someone has kidnapped him and managed to escape from him, this indicates getting rid of the problems and fears that this person is in. Whoever sees in a dream that someone is kidnapping him This indicates failure and problems that he will fall into and an attempt by enemies to harm him. If the owner can dream that he escapes kidnapping and is in debt, he will pay off all his debts and enjoy kindness and money. Whoever sees in a dream that he is kidnapped, tortured, and humiliated, this is an indication that he has enemies. Kidnapping indicates in a way General in a dream indicates problems and fears, in the event that the dreamer is unable to escape. If one sees his children being kidnapped, this is evidence of his intense fear of envy of them. The kidnapping of a son always indicates enemies. Interpretation of a dream about one’s kidnapping: If he sees a girl being kidnapped by one of her friends, he will reveal a secret to her. She was keeping him because he would be a con artist. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is kidnapped by a stranger, this is a sign that she will get married soon, and this person will do good for her and she will be happy marrying him. Whoever sees in a dream that one of her relatives is kidnapping her, this will be a scandal for her in the future. Something. Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees someone in a dream kidnapping her and they have differences in reality, this is evidence that he abandoned her and fell into countless problems with her. A pregnant woman who dreams of kidnapping a stranger has an indication of her new life that she will move into and she will feel happy. And the joy that she will find. If she sees that one of her relatives has kidnapped her, the child will be fine and looks like that person. Interpretation of a dream about a man being kidnapped Married man Whoever dreams of the kidnapping, this will be evidence of the big money that he and his righteous children will obtain. If this man is married and has no children , his wife will become pregnant soon. Kidnapping a man in a dream is generally good and a blessing and changes that person’s life for the better, whether materially or psychologically. The only bad vision for a person regarding kidnapping is that if he sees someone close to him carrying out the kidnapping, then this is not good. Add the dream that If you would like to explain it in a comment below the article, we will respond to it and clarify it

title: I dreamed that I was pregnant and I am single. What is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was pregnant when I was single. I dreamed that I was pregnant and I was single, one of the dreams that can make girls very nervous, and here in today’s topic we find that the dream has many interpretations, which came in different and could be contradictory, among the sayings of Imam Nabulsi, which I went to interpret as good and positive changes, while he said Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin in other interpretations. I dreamed that I was pregnant while I was single, so what is the interpretation of the dream? When a girl finds herself in a dream with a large stomach that resembles a pregnant woman, she wakes up from her sleep for fear that evil awaits her and seeks to know the interpretation of her dream more than burning embers, and perhaps she will find what makes her happy. Or at least reassure her that nothing is disturbing or disrupting her life. Some interpreters said that as long as the news of the pregnancy was conveyed to humanity in its entirety, it would be a different kind of livelihood. In the dream of a bachelor, it may be a lot of money or academic excellence, and it may Expresses avoidance. Of some worries and sorrows that plagued the wise woman for a long time and tormented her life. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for an unmarried woman may mean that she is expecting good news very soon, as the same person she loves and wants to be associated with may come to her and soon he will become her husband and she will live. With him, a life full of love and affection. In the case of a young school girl, of course, she feels terrified when she sees a dream about pregnancy in her sleep, but the good news is for her to excel and get very high grades, especially if the exam date approaches. Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream for a single woman who has finished her studies but She has no desire to marry and communicate with a person so that she can support herself financially and bear her own financial responsibility, so she is trying to look for one of the jobs that fulfills her for this. The dream came to her to announce that there is an offer that she will soon be offered a wonderful job, so she should not miss it. Opportunity and invest it intelligently. A girl’s swollen belly without pregnancy can indicate bad things. It can show a lot of worries and sorrows or that she loses a loved one so that she feels lonely after him and needs someone to get her out of this bad psychological state. I dreamed that I was pregnant and I was alone in Ibn Sirin had a different point of view from other interpreters, as he said that it indicates excellence in personal, academic, and scientific life. And if the girl is a student of Islamic knowledge, then God Almighty will guide her to what is good in this world and good in the hereafter. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for an unmarried woman It expresses the abundance of money coming to her, and she can marry a wealthy man, and at the same time she has many good qualities. He said: It is a sign of religious and moral commitment, and that he seeks the satisfaction of God Almighty, and seeks obedience and good deeds. If the girl is late in marriage She suffers from severe psychological pain. For this reason, the dream expresses her imminent marriage to a person who respects morals and with whom her life will be stable (God willing). What is the interpretation of a dream about a dear pregnancy?

title: Interpretation of a dream about a raging sea for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a raging sea in a dream for a single girl: An unmarried girl saw a raging sea in a dream and was very worried. It shows that there is a fateful decision in her life and she must make a final decision about it. The raging sea in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates anger and problems in her life. The vision of joy was due to The view of the sea is angry and strong. This symbolizes goodness and happiness in her life and achieving success in life and work. Single women taking pictures of the sea and she was angry, indicating that she had achieved a prominent position in society and her loved ones. Seeing the sea erupting over the house, but there is no damage to the house, indicates Problems that will be resolved soon. Whether one sees himself sitting and looking at the raging sea, it shows the dreamer’s love for nature and contemplation. To see the raging sea destroying something and the houses around it means losing someone he loves, and God knows best. Also, seeing the sea destroying the house of an unmarried woman indicates the presence of problems In the girl’s relationship with her family. One of the unmarried relatives drowned in the sea due to the raging waves, which indicates a large loss of money for them. If the raging sea is black, this indicates anger and family problems. Read also: Seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the raging sea In a dream for a married woman: The married woman saw that she was looking at the sea and it was a raging wave. It showed her that things were mixed up with her and that she could not think about her life and her future. Seeing the sea with raging waves near the house, indicates the coming good and great joy that will spread throughout the house Drowning in the sea due to raging sea waves indicates the wrong decisions you will make that will lead you to destruction. Seeing the house being submerged by raging sea waves and the inability of the people of the house to survive. Point to the great responsibility that falls on the shoulders of a married woman. Seeing the house collapsing from the flood of sea waves. Raging in the house. It indicates the disintegration of the family and the destruction of the family. If a married woman sees that the sea is rough, she floats over the house, but no damage is done. This indicates that she is a woman close to God Almighty and always escapes misfortunes with her good morals and good manners. Seeing the husband drowning in the sea due to the strong waves and trying to save him, but he failed. It indicates that there are problems between them that may lead to divorce. Seeing the husband drowning indicates the death of the husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the sea raging in a dream for a man and its meaning. The man saw the sea in front of his house and the waves were storming, and the man felt afraid. On himself and his family. It indicates the presence of danger surrounding his family, but the man is trying to alleviate the fear and protect it. Seeing a man swimming in a raging sea indicates the man’s strong character and that he is not afraid of anything. If the sea is rough but its color is clear, this indicates Good news that he will be happy to hear soon. When he saw the man entering the sea, he discovered that the waves were raging and he was afraid to approach him. This indicates that this man is a coward and does not have a strong personality as he should

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a silver ring for a married woman from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on the left hand of a married woman, and the interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a silver ring for a married womanInterpretation scholars have agreed that seeing a married woman in a dream with a silver ring is one of the visions that carries many auspicious connotations. Interpretation of a dream about a silver ring for a married woman by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about a silver ring for a married woman? Owning a silver ring in a dream for a woman For a married woman, it indicates her ability to achieve her dreams and ambitions, engage in many projects, and achieve many countless gains and profits. Seeing a silver ring symbolizes her strength and control over all matters related to her. If she has not given birth yet, and she sees this dream in her dream, This is a sign that she will be blessed with a child who will come to her, and his righteousness and blessing will prevail in the coming. The dreamer seeing herself in a dream washing a silver ring is evidence that she is a righteous woman and adheres to the teachings of her religion. If the ring she wears contains a design or engraving, this is a sign that she will achieve Soon her dreams and aspirations.Interpretation of a dream about a silver ring for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that a married woman acquires a silver ring in a dream, places it in her hand, and then it is lost or broken. This indicates the outbreak of disputes with her husband and this will lead to separation. If she sees herself wearing a silver ring, this means that she will get a wonderful job and reap many good things from it, and she will receive abundant money and become rich, and this dream indicates that she heard good news about her. Pregnancy in the same year. If it is tied to the finger of her hand, this indicates a breakthrough in her life after the difficulties she faced, and if it is ugly and rusty, this indicates that she is a lazy person and does not have the ability and motivation to succeed. And excellence, as well as neglect in self-care and health care. Seeing a faded silver ring symbolizes that she will find a job that will not bring her much profit, but will affect her social life for the relatively better. All the dreams that you have in your mind, you will find their interpretation here on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website From Google.Interpretation of a dream about a silver ring for a pregnant woman.Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman with a silver ring in a dream symbolizes the acquisition of abundant goods and abundant supplies from where she cannot count after the birth of her newborn. It states that he will enter a new stage and gain a lot of goodness, joy and happiness.To see a pregnant woman in Her dream that she is wearing a silver man’s ring means that she will give birth to a son, and it symbolizes her husband’s high status and his promotion at work, and she will earn a lot of money, kindness, and blessings from him, and he will be one of the owners of the property. This dream indicates that he has a strong personality capable of facing many problems and the ability to overcome them. With ease. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her silver ring is broken, this means that there are some hypocrites and deceivers in her life and their feelings towards her are unrealistic and fake, and this indicates that they are trying in various ways to trap her. And her involvement in many calamities and conspiracies. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring for a married woman shows...

title: Interpretation of hearing the news of the father’s death in a dream

preview.html: And not to prolong the discussion, let us learn more through our website, and explain the interpretation of hearing the news of death in a dream, so stay with us.Interpretation of hearing the news of the death of the father in a dream Psychologists say that this dream is linked to the subconscious mind of the person, especially if he is very attached to his father and cannot Imagine life without him. Therefore, he can see the death of his father in a dream repeatedly, and every time he feels the same sadness and horror. Dream interpretation scholars have other opinions about this dream, and it is one of the most agreed upon interpretive opinions. It is that the father will have a long life full of health and well-being. And good deeds, and God knows best. There are other interpretive opinions that indicate that the dreamer is going through a difficult psychological state as a result of the crises and problems that he faces in his life, without finding support and support from those around him. This is in the case of the death of the father and hearing the news of his death again. If the father is alive and the fortuneteller hears The news of his death in a dream is a good sign. It indicates the end of problems and the removal of worries from the dreamer’s life. If the father is the one suffering from problems and worries, then the dream is good news for him. It is said that the death of a living father or hearing the news of his death in a dream is for a woman, whether she is single or Married or pregnant. This is evidence that the next few days of the dreamer’s life will witness a lot of good luck, a lot of food and good news. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a dead father hugging his daughter. Interpretation of a dream of hearing news of the death of a living person in a dream. This dream shows how much the dreamer cares about this person. And support and support him constantly. And if he cries over his death in a dream, then he sincerely loves this person and wishes to always see him well. If the person who heard the news of his death does not matter to the fortuneteller, and there is no strong relationship between them. Here, the dream indicates that this person is going through a great experience and that God knows best. The interpretation of a dream about hearing news of the death of a living person in a dream is evidence that the fortuneteller will soon hear good news about this person. He may get married or be promoted in his job and get a job opportunity abroad, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that someone informs him of the death of one of his relatives. This indicates a long life for that person. Hearing the news of the death of a dead person is in fact good news for the dreamer’s marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the news of the death of a husband in a dream. Hearing the news of the death of a living husband in a dream is a good dream. Which expresses the long life of the husband, and the end of Its problems and rulings, God willing. If the husband becomes ill and the woman hears the news of his death in a dream, this is good news of recovery and recovery from the disease, and God knows best. It is said: If a divorced woman hears in a dream the news of the death of her ex-husband, this is evidence of good relations between them. Hearing the news of the death of a living husband in a dream is evidence of The great bond and love between the dreamer and her husband and the stability of their married life. Her husband died and she heard the news of his death in a dream. This is evidence that the dreamer misses her husband, and sadness is always renewed in her heart over her separation. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a dead father coming back to life. Interpretation of a dream of hearing news of the death of a friend in a dream. If the fortune teller disagrees With a friend and they had a long dispute, he heard in a

title: Hair removal in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: As for the interpretation of the dream of removing hair from the body in a dream, we will talk about it in detail in the following lines by our translator. Interpretation of the vision of hair removal in a dream for a single girl. Seeing hair removal in a dream for a single woman is one of the visions worthy of praise. Which heralds marriage and engagement in the next few days, God willing. Hair removal in the dream of a girl who has never been married. A sign of the collapse of worry and anxiety and the arrival of comfort and happiness in her life soon. If an unmarried woman removes her hair in a painful way in a dream, she may lose the one she loves. Either separation and apathy or death, and God knows best. If she is a woman An unmarried woman pulls her hair in a dream, as this is a sign of the death of her father or brother. She may find herself in a dilemma that is difficult to get out of. Feeling severe pain when removing hair in a dream is a sign of suffering and difficulties in life. Psychological pain surrounds the viewer, and God knows best. The appearance of body hair In a dream, it is long and intense. It indicates many fears, burdens, and responsibilities placed on the dreamer’s shoulders. See also: Interpretation of the vision of hair removal for individual legs. Interpretation of the vision of hair removal in a dream for a married woman. Removal of body hair in a dream for a married woman is a good vision. Which portends positive changes in her life, provided Not to suffer from any pain during hair removal. If a woman feels severe pain and pain while removing hair from her body in a dream. This means that he is going through a great experience, and he is standing in front of her with his arms crossed, and God knows best. It is also said that removing hair from the entire body in a dream is a sign On relief from distress and anguish. She improved living conditions and opened the doors of livelihood for her husband, God willing. Whoever sees hair growing quickly on her body will have abundant livelihood and abundant money. If the hair on her body is long and thick, then she suffers from instability in her marriage. There are many differences between her and Her partner. When a woman sees in her sleep as if her husband is pulling hair from her body. This is an unpleasant vision and expresses the husband’s bankruptcy and the accumulation of debts on him, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of removing hair in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man removes hair from his body in a dream with a razor blade. This is evidence of... Comforting his affairs, removing his worries, and alleviating his distress after a long period of distress and suffering. When a man removes hair with sweetness in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision. It expresses the losses that the dreamer will suffer as a result of his wrong actions and reckless decisions. If a man sees himself in a dream as if his wife is removing hair on his body. This is evidence that his wife supports him and supports him and bears the burdens with him. Also, one of the family’s responsibilities is to raise his morale and strengthen him. Long hair in a dream represents an abundance of food and an abundance of money, in addition to pubic and armpit hair. A long mustache and beard in a dream indicates worries due to poverty and the accumulation of debts, and God knows best. Read Also: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the body with sweetness. The meaning of seeing hair removed in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Removing hair in a dream for a pregnant woman is a good vision that brings her goodness and happiness. It portends a coming.

title: Interpretation of the crescent moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the crescent moon by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the crescent moon in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she is committing many mistakes against herself and has to review her accounts. If an unmarried girl sees the crescent moon in her dream, this dream indicates that she will soon become engaged to a good young man. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the crescent moon in A dream is a symbol of weddings, happy occasions, and good news, and God knows best. Seeing the green crescent in a dream indicates marriage to a wealthy person who occupies a prominent position in society. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Eid al-Fitr crescent. A dream about seeing the Eid al-Fitr crescent: It symbolizes the emergence of goodness, abundant living, abundant money and happiness that comes your way. Seeing the Eid al-Fitr crescent in a dream means that the dreamer will be able to defeat his enemies, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. A married woman who sees the crescent and its beautiful shape indicates a happy married life and family stability. If the dreamer sees the Eid al-Fitr crescent in his dream, this means that the dreamer will achieve his goals that He was seeking to achieve it. Seeing the crescent and the moon together in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees the crescent and the moon in her dream, this indicates that she will soon marry a good young man. Seeing the crescent and the moon in a dream means that he will reach a high position next time, God willing. For the dreamer to see the crescent and the moon together. In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals that he was trying to achieve. The sleeper’s vision of the moon and the crescent together symbolizes the coming of goodness, abundant living, blessings, relief from distress, and the removal of worries. Interpretation of seeing the red crescent in a dream If the dreamer sees the red crescent in his dream, this is a vision Bad and means that the dreamer will face a health crisis. Al-Osaimi says that seeing a red crescent in a dream symbolizes the worries and sorrow that the dreamer is going through in his life. An unmarried girl who sees a red crescent in her dream indicates that she will soon separate from her lover or fiancé. Seeing a red crescent in The dream symbolizes that the dreamer will face many problems and crises in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Ramadan crescent for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees the Ramadan crescent in her dream indicates the success that the girl will achieve in her academic life. If the dreamer sees the Ramadan crescent in his dream, this indicates that He will return to God and repent to Him, and God knows best. Seeing the crescent of Ramadan in a dream announces the strength of her faith in God Almighty and her closeness to Him by doing good deeds. Seeing the crescent of Ramadan in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances and that he will have a happy married life. Interpretation of seeing two crescents in the sky in a dream Seeing two crescents in the sky in The dream is good news and happy circumstances for the dreamer, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees two crescents in the sky in her dream, this indicates that her due date is approaching, and God knows the unseen. The dreamer sees a crescent in the sky in a dream, then this dream indicates goodness, ample living, and abundant money by God’s command. Seeing a crescent A pregnant woman in the sky indicates that she will be blessed with twins and that her birth will be easy, God willing. Seeing the moon in a dream for a married woman if she sees

title: Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream

preview.html: In our article today, we will present the color red in a dream in detail, as this color is one of the colors that has many connotations in real life and also in dreams, and through the following lines from the encyclopedia we will present a dream interpretation in which the color of single, married, pregnant, divorced, and men. Red color in a dream Red color in a dream Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the color red in a dream symbolizes the feelings and emotions of the dreamer. If one dreams that he is surrounded by this color on all sides, this indicates that he is angry and excited in reality. One of the dreams that has been well interpreted is the dream of red flowers, as it is a sign that The dreamer will soon hear news that will make him very happy and indicate that happy events are coming on his way. Whoever sees a red fire in his dream, his dream indicates that he will have a high status among those around him and that God will bless him in high positions. The appearance of the sky in red in a dream indicates The dreamer will suffer from sorrows and worries in the coming period and it may indicate that the dreamer is surrounded by dangers that threaten him, so he must be careful. The color red in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees the color red in her dream, then this vision is good news that she will marry someone she loves and may God make her happy. Almighty. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wearing a red dress, her dream indicates that she will marry someone who suits her. One of the most promising visions for a single woman is her dream of a red bag, which is an indication that she will succeed in her life, whether on the professional or personal level. The long red dress indicates in An unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will be able to achieve what she is looking for in her life, which will change for the better. Interpretation of a married woman who sees the color red in a dream: If a married woman sees a bright red color in her dream, this means that there is someone who has a grudge against her and is planning to harm her. But if If the red color that the married woman saw in her dream was dark, her vision indicates that she is pregnant. One of the most promising dreams for a married woman is when she dreams that her house is painted red, indicating the coming of joys and happy events for her and her family. Red curtains in a married woman’s dream indicate The dreamer’s happiness in her life with her husband. As for red dresses in a married woman’s dream, this indicates that her husband will receive a promotion and that there is a lot of money coming her way that may be an inheritance. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of red. The color red indicates in a pregnant woman’s dream Indicates that she will give birth to a girl. If she dreams that she is wearing a red coat, the dream shows her the need to stay away from anything that worries her and harms her. The color red in a dream for a man: If a married man sees the color red in his dream, this means that he is characterized by bad morals and his distance from God Almighty. And whoever Well-interpreted visions: A dream of an unmarried man wearing a red hat, because it is good news that he will marry a rich woman with great influence. A man’s dream of a red car indicates
